title: Anyone know of a free font similar to Newzald (bold/black italic)?
content:
I'm currently on my laptop and don't have access to Photoshop, so I hope a link to the font will suffice.

Anyone know of a free font alternative that's similar to the awesome Newzald font ( [http://vllg.com/KLIM/Newzald/mudTyper+Weights/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150225002842/http:/vllg.com/KLIM/Newzald/mudTyper+Weights/ "http://vllg.com/KLIM/Newzald/mudTyper+Weights/"))? I'm specifically looking for the bold italic or black italic version.
author: Grifter730

comments.content: You won't find many free text fonts that are anywhere near Newzald's quality. Best bet would be to go with one of the fonts that comes with Adobe CS like Warnock or Minion.
Wow you must be a truly serious graphic designer asking for a rip-off version of some top notch quality stuff!
